svg.title: VSA superposition versus VSABrains addressable trajectories
svg.desc: Left panel shows many events superposed into one vector, which blurs order. Right panel shows events written along a discrete path with an index, preserving order as address.

text.font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

svg.text: Two ways to store a long story

text.font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
